  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    Bluetooth associated item

        Build Bluetooth association item
        Parameters:
        deviceUuid - device uid
        connected - connection state
        isFirstConnection - define if the device is connected for the first time
        busy - define if the device is busy at this time
        device - bluetooth device object
        deviceFunctions - map of functions/property for this item
